metadata.title: CVE-2019-6292 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in singledocparser.cpp in yaml-cpp (akaLibYaml-C++) 0.6.2. Stack Exhaustion occurs in YAML::SingleDocParser, andthere is a stack consumption problem caused by recursive stack frames:HandleCompactMap, HandleMap, HandleFlowSequence, HandleSequence,HandleNode. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause adenial-of-service via a cpp file.

criterions.comment: yaml-cpp0.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
yaml-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
